AI Description: SymPy is a Python library for symbolic mathematics. It aims to become a full-featured computer algebra system (CAS) while keeping the code as simple as possible in order to be comprehensible and easily extensible. SymPy is written entirely in Python.
Core Features: Supports Various Mathematical Operations Including Algebraic & Calculus Operations, Solving Equations, Simplification, & More, Can Be Used To Perform Symbolic Computation, Manipulate & Solve Equations, Integrate & Differentiate, Solve Differential Equations, & Much More, Provides A Wide Range Of Functionality For Symbolic Mathematics Similar To Systems Like Mathematica Or Maple But Entirely In Python, Free & Open-Source Software With An Active Community Maintaining & Extending Its Capabilities, Can Be Easily Integrated Into Python Code & Utilized For Various Mathematical Tasks
General Tags: Python Library, Symbolic Mathematics, Computer Algebra System
